Comment:
Hi everyone!

Gerhard (Chicoboy) asked me to annotate this game.  It was a game from Charleshiggie's Group J Training Tournament.  It is white who cops Old Matey - so, how does this happen?  Well, there is a plethora of unusual opening moves from white including a lotta pawn moves, so black does get a lead in development in the opening.  Well, we shall see how the game pans out .......
3. f4 - so Chris decided to answer Gerhard's Nimzowich Defense with a delayed King's Gambit.

26. ..... Nd2 MATE!! Sadly white opts for sudden death.  Chris is a piece for a pawn light in the final position and with the endgame approaching this would have no doubt been decisive in Gerhard's favour anyway.  As snap mates go, this one is a beauty!  Well played Gerhard!
